businessType.ui:title: Welcome!
businessType.ui:description: First we’ll need to ask you a few questions about your prospective business.

businessType.ui:title: What type of company do you want to start?

businessName.ui:title: Business Name
businessName.ui:description: What do you want the Customer-facing name of your company to be? If you don’t know yet. Type ‘unsure’.

businessDescription.ui:title: Business Description
businessDescription.ui:description: In 1-2 sentences, describe the purpose of your business. This should be a brief statement about what you are setting out to accomplish, sell or produce.

businessStructure.ui:title: What type of legal structure do you want to create for your business?
businessStructure.ui:description: If you have not yet researched and determined the proper legal structure for your company, it is recommended that you consult a trusted advisor such as a lawyer or your local Small Business Development Center [link], before committing to a legal structure. You can click ‘unsure’ for now.

locations.ui:title: Locations
locations.ui:description: Please indicate the desired Zip Code of each location, and whether or not you are interested in obtaining a liquor license. If you do not know the Zip Code yet. Type N/A.

license.ui:title: Are you intersted in getting a liquor license for this location?
